charinfo.name: Atsui (S)
charinfo.description: Atsui (S) is a skilled swordsman of the Hidden Cloud Village as well as the hot blooded brother of Samui.

abilities.name: Kenjutsu Fire Release
abilities.description: Atsui (S) uses Kenjutsu Fire Release. The following 3 turns damage dealt to Atsui (S) will be reduced by 10 and any enemy that uses a skill on Atsui (S) will be dealt 10 affliction damage*. Fire Wall costs 1 random chakra less during this skill and Flame Beheading will deal an additional 10 damage.

abilities.name: Fire Wall
abilities.description: Using Fire Wall Atsui (S) targets all enemies. For 1 turn all enemies will be dealt 20 affliction damage* that ignores invulnerability if they use a new skill.

abilities.name: Flame Beheading
abilities.description: Atsui (S) uses Flame Beheading on one enemy dealing 25 piercing damage.

abilities.name: Kenjutsu Guard
abilities.description: This skill makes Atsui (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
